title: Eskimo artist: Kenojouac
creator_credit: John Feeney, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Beautiful Inuit prints by an artist who is also a wife and mother. This film shows how the Inuit artist’s drawings are transferred to stone and then printed for sale in the south.
creator_credit_for_label: John Feeney, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
description: Beautiful Inuit prints by an artist who is also a wife and mother. This film shows how the Inuit artist’s drawings are transferred to stone and then printed for sale in the south.
